attributes.action: allow British Citizens with right of abode to open UK bank accounts in at least England  irrespective of their actual country of residence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is ridiculous that British Citizens with right of abode in the UK cannot open a bank account in England, Scotland or Wales if their current residence is not a UK address. There are controls in the respective countries for non-UK residents, so their addresses are actually officially proven. Paradoxically, there are NO controls on addresses inside the UK.
